Resource.name: UserDatabase
Resource.description: User database that can be updated and saved

Service:
<Connector port="<%= portrange %>80" protocol="HTTP/1.1" connectionTimeout="20000" redirectPort="<%= portrange %>43" />
<% if sso == true -%> <Connector port="<%= portrange %>09" protocol="AJP/1.3" tomcatAuthentication="false" packetSize="65536" redirectPort="<%= portrange %>43" /> <% else -%><Connector port="<%= portrange %>09" protocol="AJP/1.3" maxThreads="200" redirectPort="<%= portrange %>43" /> <% end -%>
<Engine name="Catalina" defaultHost="localhost" jvmRoute="<%= name.split("_")[1] %>">
<Host name="<%= vhostname %>.foo.bar" autoDeploy="false" deployOnStartup="false"> <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.AccessLogValve" directory="logs" prefix="<%= vhostname %>." suffix=".txt" pattern="common" resolveHosts="false" />
<Context path="<% if webapp != "ROOT" -%><%= webapp %><% else -%><% end -%>" docBase="<%= wwwdir %>/webapps/<%= webapp %>" reloadable="false" > <% if mysql_cons != "none" %> <%= scope.function_template("puppet-apache-tomcat/tomcat-ressources/mysql.erb") %> <% end -%> <% if oracle_cons != "none" %> <%= scope.function_template("puppet-apache-tomcat/tomcat-ressources/oracle.erb") %> <% end -%> <% if ldap_res != "none" %> <%= scope.function_template("puppet-apache-tomcat/tomcat-ressources/ldap.erb") %> <% end %>
